Posts.Content: hi, thanks for the replies to my last post. sorry haven't replied sooner, have had a pretty rubbish time with the doxetaxel. Not as bad as the fec though . joint and muscle pain and very tired. Have had to give myself 5 injections to stimulate white cells which added to the pain, is it normal to still feel the effects of injections in sternum after finishing them last Friday, or could it be still the effects of doxetaxel. Anyone else experienced this. hope your all well
Posts.Title: is it normal

Posts.Content: thank you for your reply feel a bit better about it now. will mention it though thanks x
Posts.Title: is it normal

Posts.Content: hi all, had my second of 6 chemo sessions, 1 more to go and start 3 sessions of the  t  bit docetaxel and on the 4th Herceptin starts for 18 sessions. I have had lots of mixed messages yes you will loose lashes and brows on docetaxel or no you wont or it depends  I still got them at the moment even though I am rocking the bald head. PLEASE can anybody tell me there experiences with docetaxel. thanks x
Posts.Title: fec - t

Posts.Content: Thank you for both replies. Guess i just wait and see. What will be will be  Hope your both ok Xx
Posts.Title: fec - t

Posts.Content: hi , sorry its been so long before I replied . been feeling pretty rubbish after doxetaxel. bone and joint pain. think it was made worse by injections to stimulate bone marrow. Its been 2 weeks since last chemo is it normal to still feel effects of injections in sternum I had 5 injections in total. hope everyone well misty
